data.message: You’ve lost a lot of good supporters because you are hateful and just nasty. Like every demented liberal Hollywood scum. Really thought you were smarter and better than that.

replies.message: He’s just another POS loser that we don’t have to ever engage with again. Anti-American pos like the rest of those pedo , rapist bisexual , gay assholes in Hollyweird click. He’s nothing to lose any sleep over ... refreshing throwing his dumbass out !!!  He’s done too many drugs .. brain cells are toast.

Well over 60% of America Disapprove with whom you Voted for and continue to worship ! It's not all Donald's fault he and we all know he's fucked up. What went wrong is that you fucked up. Explain that to your children's , children.
Hateful and nasty is what you Trumptards are. Donna R. Watford is perfect example of that with her nasty ass mouth.
While he may have lost "supporters". He still has a lot of people who are against Trump as his fans. Not to mention some Trump supporters who STILL fuck with him regardless of what he said.
